website_summaries.verdict: Some use as shams, some as pillow cases. Not overly ruffly, and good for the price.
pros: Comes in a variety of sizes and subued colors
cons: Repeated complaints that the opening is in an awkward location

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great...
customer_reviews.text: I like that they fit the pillow right and they are comfortable. My big problem with these and why I gave 3 stars is because the quality is good but the opening on the pillow is at the top and not in the middle like most shams. So they keep sliding off the pillows as you sleep and you have to adjust them almost all the time, on top of that the opening doesn't close anymore over time and it's just a bit of a haste. They could really be 5 star if the opening was in the middle to keep the pillow from sliding out in place, which woulda been great.
customer_reviews.author: Sindel

customer_reviews.title: They're okay but just okay
customer_reviews.text: They fit well but the fabric is thinner than I expected. Also, while they LOOK like they have four equal sides with the nice trim, it's really only three. You put the pillow in through one side and kind of fuss with the sham to get it to look good, but that side won't fluff out as well as the other three. I thought this would be an envelope kind of sham -- the kind where you put the pillows in through the center of the back -- but it's not. I wouldn't order them again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bea Haven

customer_reviews.title: These are nice. I bought them to embroider a design on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I bought them to embroider a design on them to add to effect with a quilt bedspread. I washed them, and they wrinkled. But I starched and ironed and they looked superior. Would not be good to sleep on then expect them to look nice on a made bed. For my purposes, the embroidered cases will not be used, just placed on the bed and they look great. Love the crisp look of simple white shams - ironed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: they smell like elmers glue)
customer_reviews.text: If you want a pillow case with a flimsy edging attached, these are the "shams" for you. The picture posted by the company is deceptive because it shows the edges standing up. You can't even tell it has them once the droop against the pillow. Very disappointing. (Also, they smell like elmers glue).
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best....
customer_reviews.text: These are real egyptian cotton shams and they're the BEST! The shams don't get real hot like many other brands do, stays cool and the sizing is perfect! ☆☆ 5 STARS ☆☆
customer_reviews.author: PINK09

customer_reviews.title: Slit on the side instead of the middle
customer_reviews.text: This has a really weird design. The slit to insert the pillow is nearer the side of the pillow than the middle. Therefore, it doesn’t hold the pillow well at all. It seems difficult to mess up a pillowcase, but they managed to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cowie

customer_reviews.title: Faulty positioning for the sham opening
customer_reviews.text: While the fabric is soft, the construction is the reason for only two stars. Since the opening on the back is not located in the center but very close to the edge, the pillow underneath always shows. The sham is never completely closed. I endured this for awhile but have now decided to buy another brand that can just be tossed on the bed without very careful positioning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pillow Shams
customer_reviews.text: They look better than I expected! Great value and look high end. I would recommend steaming them before putting onto your pillows for cleaner look. 5-stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good basic shams
customer_reviews.text: My bedding is all white. I love the Euro-shams and pillow because I often prop myself up and read in bed and the size/shape is better than standard pillow. When the bed is made, the Euros are in the back and barely visible. To buy shams to match my bedding would be $60 on sale. Ludicrous price for something that is more for function than style. This is the 2nd set I have purchased. The first was for a rarely-used guest room. Now in the master suite they are equally functional. They aren't super soft or super stiff. The only slight downside is to look their best they need pressing.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Turned yellow
customer_reviews.text: Turned yellow after two washes. These cases had an odor upon arrival. Washed once by themselves and seemed a little discolored. Just washed for a 2nd time (they’re in a guest bedroom) and they’ve turned completely yellow/dingy. Very diaapppinted.
customer_reviews.author: DebV

customer_reviews.title: pretty annoying. waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pillowcases so that I can use my 80x80 pillow that I bought in Germany. unfortunately this is not workin out, the pillow case is too small so my pillow comes out the case every night....pretty annoying. waste of money. the fabric itself is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Susann Bouldin

customer_reviews.title: Very soft material
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived as promised. The material is very soft, if a little see through. What I am disappointed about is that this is supposed to be a new product, but when I opened it, there were stains on it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha B

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: Are use these for Homes Staging. I do have to steam them because when staging a home I need everything to be crisp and wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerfan01

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL 100% COTTON SHAMS
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful 100% cotton chocolate shams!!! I LOVE AMERICAN PILLOWCASE sheets & duvets. The material is soft, not too thin, not too thick, just right!!! Feels better after a few washings. Noticed no bleeding of color when washing. I'm very satisfied and I highly recommend ALL their bedding products.
customer_reviews.author: Kai808

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell, Shrink When Washed, Easily Wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, poor quality. These pillow covers had an odd chemical smell out of the package. After making sure they fit my pillows, I removed the tags and washed to remove the smell and dried them following the directions. They no longer fit my pillows after being washed- they had shrunk by about two inches. I had to go back to using my IKEA pillow covers which were the same dimensions as these pillows and do not shrink or wrinkle as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are really thin, but they work for our guest bed that is not always used. Ok quality, great value
customer_reviews.author: Taylor James

customer_reviews.title: They are like pillowcases, but I was hoping they would work ...
customer_reviews.text: These are soft, but I wish they were more of a stiff type of fabric. They are like pillowcases, but I was hoping they would work better as decorative pillow covers on top of our guest bed. I may look for different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Killerdana

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY AT AFFORDABLE PRICES
customer_reviews.text: i was really pleased with my pillowcases. They helped make a beautiful bed and everything came from Amazon except the two antique dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A Robison

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Stitches ripped almost immediately. Fabric is very thin. Definitely get what you pay for in this situation.
customer_reviews.author: SavlikeGa

customer_reviews.title: These were so soft and felt great but were nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: These were so soft and felt great but were nothing like the picture. The edges do not stand up as shown in the picture. It fits more like a pillow case and I was pretty disappointed as I purchased them to be shams.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice cotton shams
customer_reviews.text: These were what I expected. They aren’t fancy by any means just some nice cotton pillow shams that were exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High End.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pillow cases. They are so soft. Bery well made. They look great on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sebolka

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful items to add to your linens!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that two were added to the order! They are soft and cuddly, rather you use on your Couches or your bed. I would definitely recommend this Product to anyone that needs them!
customer_reviews.author: Anni Avery

customer_reviews.title: These are not pillow shams. They are thinner than ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not pillow shams. They are thinner than your actual pillow cases, they are not for pillow shams. Not worth the price, don't buy these highway robbery.
customer_reviews.author: Boxcar

customer_reviews.title: Very soft with a few washings but would require ironing to look good.
customer_reviews.text: They are a sham style but the opening in back only has a 1 or 2" overlap so doesn't keep pillow in well. Very soft with a few washings but would require ironing to look good.
customer_reviews.author: Rita J

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice shams/pillowcases! Delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shams/pillowcases! Delivered quickly, they are soft, durable and well-matched to the standard pillow size. The material is not quite as thick as I had expected but they look fine on plain pillows (not the ones with the blue striping) and make the bed look nice. Good product for the pricing!
customer_reviews.author: Cilla B

customer_reviews.title: Nice but thin
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for thicker material but they still look nice and compliment my guest room bedding. I had a hard time finding flat pillows, most pillows are fat and don't fit as well in these cases.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The duvet covers are so soft and just as described. Great customer service. I highly recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley M.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric Thin
customer_reviews.text: These pillow shams will do the job, but I gave them 4 out of 5 stars because of the fabric. It is fairly thin. I hope they will last as shams.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Huenemann

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like these fine though the opening at the bottom where you insert the pillow is a bit odd.. usually the opening is midway but this one is at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Snow

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but needs ironing
customer_reviews.text: Cotton needs ironing which I have to blame on myself for not reading the full description.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Shea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and pictured
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Other reviews about wrinkles are true they do get wrinkles but I am not bothered by it. A quick pass with the steamer takes them out fine for me. I also appreciate that they were perfectly white, no spots/stains at all on them.
customer_reviews.author: arett

customer_reviews.title: Shams are as expected. Wife bought them for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Shams are as expected. Wife bought them for my daughter to use at the dorms. So far, holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: hihawk

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: These have not worn well. We bought them in February. It is now July. They have shrunk and no longer fit the pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: I used the pillowcases on my white shams previously purchased on Amazon. They fit perfect. No problem with see through color, since both items are white. It washes and dries very good.
customer_reviews.author: GSC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple. Just what I wanted. It fits my pillows nicely. The closure is just a pocket, but there's no real reason I need anything more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I love my pillow cases I ordered from amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love my pillow cases I ordered from amazon, I needed something to bring out my canary yellow duvet cover and shams. I had alot of yellow pillows in different shapes and styles and adding the white pillow shams made it look ever better. I tell all my friends and family you can find whatever you need on amazon. Tara W.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described, but not what I ideally wanted after trying the look for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shams and just what I was looking for! Smooth and soft, and not so thin that you can see the design of the pillow inside. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: May West

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I had to send these back as there was a stain on the corner of one of them. Otherwise, they look good and are very soft. I re-ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Towns

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and good size - however does not really look or feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and good size - however does not really look or feel closed unless you have a very flat pillow. I wanted it more for comfort and cleanliness so its not a big deal but for decoration it is not so great looking because of this
customer_reviews.author: Corri

customer_reviews.title: A big too big
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is decent and the price is great, but these shams are a bit too big for a euro pillow, so they don't look like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Feuerstein

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.text: The pillowcases arrived very quickly and are exactly as shown. I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D.

customer_reviews.title: Regretful purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not great. There is a flap that just dangles, looks weird but works as a pillow cover i suppose
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just what I was looking for. I love the fabric and the seams are very nicely finished-- very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keei West

customer_reviews.title: so they sit pretty limply on the pillows
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I guess I shouldn't have expected much. These are very thin cotton, so they sit pretty limply on the pillows, and they wrinkle easily. Do not expect them to look as smooth as the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: A nice euro pillow case
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I would like these or not as I read the reviews but it is what I was looking for. I have been looking for pillow cases not for decoration pillows but for euro pillows I use to sleep on. These are perfect as they are soft cotton and wash nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t feel like “Egyptian cotton”
customer_reviews.text: Product description says Egyptian cotton, but it feels more like the thinnest, cheapest pillow cases you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing pillow shams! They are softer than any of the others I have purchased previously and we all fight over who gets to use the pillows. They are great quality as well. I love the ruffle around the edges.
customer_reviews.author: robert wise II

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: for $15 a pair, it is very good for the price. quality is comparable to department stores.
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These just haven't held up. We've washed them multiple times and they look pretty beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer of item is the problem
customer_reviews.text: My rating has nothing to do with the seller. The package arrived in a timely manner. My disappointment is with the manufacturer. When you take these out of the package they are soft and amazing!! However, once they come out of the washer and dryer they are an ironing nightmare. Very hard to get the wrinkles out. I finally did them damp and with a steam iron. They never fully were wrinkle free and they wrinkle at the lightest touch. They were ok or good enough to use as a "staging" prop for our bed while trying to sell our house. But I must say the did not look pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product with good quality. Looks good on bed and ordered and shipped to door within 2 days...very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: wood0504

customer_reviews.title: Better product exists elsewhere I’m sure
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. Fit well. Better product exists elsewhere I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie page

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: American pillowcases- I bought 2 standard pillow cases and 1 large. The pillow cases arrived quickly. My only complaint is that they are thin.
customer_reviews.author: jclvnlife

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Classy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our big Euro pillows!! Love the look. The pillow cases are soft and have a classic look! Will definitely buy a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, beautiful soft (high thread count) fabric, exceptionally well-made. Fits my standard European pillows perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Korr

customer_reviews.title: Although the size is perfect for the material is very see-through
customer_reviews.text: Although the size is perfect for the material is very see-through. We have pillows with flower imprints and they show up through the pillowcases. I would recommended getting a thicker material with higher count quality.
customer_reviews.author: jnlnorth425

customer_reviews.title: These are terrific pillow shams for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific pillow shams for the price. Extremely soft and elegant. I would recommend this manufacturer for sheets and pillowcases any time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Schoolcraft

customer_reviews.title: Over sized queen pillows fit in them nicely. Only used for decoration
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material. If pillows are not white colors will show through. Over sized queen pillows fit in them nicely. Only used for decoration. O.K. for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doverite

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Edges are floppy but they still look pretty good, especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are great material and look wonderful on my bed! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Eb

customer_reviews.title: The cotton is really fresh and cool in this hot weather
customer_reviews.text: The cotton is really fresh and cool in this hot weather, and the Euro design case makes fitting the pillows easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Taurus

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality, but nothing great
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The fabric is pretty thin and flimsy, and the seams started ripping a little as soon as I started stuffing them with the pillow. They look fine though, and will do until I find nicer bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shams!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow shams! Wash and dry easily. Always looks nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: These are ok but thin enough that a light green ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok but thin enough that a light green pattern covering one of my pillows shows through. I would only use if your pillows are solid white.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, looks great. I love how deep the back pocket is instead of having the break in the middle of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice on my bed
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on my bed. My pillows are very plump so I was worried about the sham fitting properly. Fits great, looks great. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I am happy with them and the look so nice
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric - flap on back must be pinned closed to keep pillow insert in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. They look good with our white down comforter
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. They look good with our white down comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Alice T

customer_reviews.title: Egyptian cotton, very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material, plain white, just like I wanted! Delivered quickly, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Heather DiTaranto

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty generic. The stitching looks a little weak but ...
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty generic. The stitching looks a little weak but they're holding up ok so far and I don't generally sleep on these pillows. My biggest complaint is that the fabric is so thin.
customer_reviews.author: M. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: great quality. Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Fits euro pillow as expected. Very soft pillowcases as well, great quality. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: TSB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price! These look great on our daughters bed!
customer_reviews.author: KGarcia

customer_reviews.title: ... the dryer - these pillowcases need ironing but I love the look if you take the
customer_reviews.text: even right out of the dryer - these pillowcases need ironing but I love the look if you take the time
customer_reviews.author: plittle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like pic on amazon
customer_reviews.text: So in the pic, it looks like the same border goes all around the cases. No. It opens like a regular pillow case, so one side has no border at all. Material is very flimsy too.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Very easily wrinkled.
customer_reviews.text: Will not purchase again. Must be ironed every time they are washed. Very easily wrinkled.

customer_reviews.title: like shown in photo
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping the pillow cases would fit more snug to the pillow inserted, like shown in photo, but the pillow case is actually quite loose. So, they're just OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leanne

customer_reviews.title: The other reviews stated that the pillows gaped in the back when the pillow was inserted and yes they do but for this price I wa
customer_reviews.text: Pillow shams were received as advertised. The other reviews stated that the pillows gaped in the back when the pillow was inserted and yes they do but for this price I was pleased with the quality of the material. The gaping was secondary as these pillows are in a guest bedroom and rarely used.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the flap in the back does not really close properly and has no way to stay closed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were very soft and exactly what I had hoped for for my Tommy Bahamma spread

customer_reviews.text: Really soft material, but one of the pillowcases came with a small hole in it and I will be returning it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Margaux

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft but thin and came out of dryer very wrinkled. Expected shams to be sturdier. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. I ordered 6 pillow cases and I will be ordering more!

customer_reviews.title: Pay less for exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: I expect to pay more for the quality of these pillowcases! I'm very pleased with my purchase

customer_reviews.title: The flat ends of the pillow cover do not stand ...
customer_reviews.text: The flat ends of the pillow cover do not stand straight out as shown in the picture. I purchased insert pillow as suggested and the pillows fit perfectly, but the flat ends just droop.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are a great fit and quality they do need ironing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty thin and don't stand stiff around the edges like ...
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty thin and don't stand stiff around the edges like in the picture but still pretty soft and fit my jumbo pillows well

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, humble pillowcases. The fit is as promised. Perfect for sleeping.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Good quality And they fit the pillows good.

customer_reviews.title: Euro pillow shams
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Love the Euro shams as a background for my smaller shams.

customer_reviews.title: bright, White, Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Bright white, great amount of room in them and are super soft. HIGHLY recommend

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the money? Have you pried pillow shams at JC Penney, Bed, Bath & Beyond? It's absolutely ! Found cost for one sham to be in the area of $24.95 for nothing special. Then it dawned on me ... Amazon. The price was perfect & I got 2! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Pamesue

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: These are pillowcases in that they slip onto a pillow from the end. Not like asham that has the split flap in the middle of the backside.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect description
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Inexpensive, soft, bright white fabric.

customer_reviews.text: Just o k flimsy material but they served the purpose!!

customer_reviews.text: Nice fit great fit but does require starch and ironing to give a fresh crisp look

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was just what I expected. Great quality, well packaged and came right when expected. The quality of the Shams were great and they work perfectly as a for my previous Shams.

customer_reviews.title: They wrinkle very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the quality I thought they would be. They wrinkle very easily.

product_meta.title: American Pillowcase Luxury Egyptian Cotton 300 Thread Count 2-Piece Pillow Sham Set 21 x 26 Inch- Standard, Black
feature_bullets: 100% Egyptian Cotton - Luxuriously-long Staple Cotton Yarns Make These Pillow Shams Incredibly Soft and Durable
STANDARD PILLOW SHAMS – Perfectly fits a 20” x 26” pillow. Confirm pillow size before ordering. Quantity 2
LUXURY 100% EGYPTIAN COTTON - Shams with 2” flange on all four sides and overlapping fabric in back for finished look
HIGHEST QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Made of 100% combed cotton spun into compact yarns and woven into a 300 thread count fabric. Very rare to use such beautiful yarns for retail sheeting
BIO-POLISHED - You’ll feel the fantastic softness at first touch. Sateen weave and MERCERIZED for a beautiful sheen.

EASY CARE & PRESHRUNK FOR A PERFECT FIT - Machine wash on cold. Tumble dry on low. Do not use bleach or softeners. Preshrunk for a perfecly snug fit on your pillow, please confirm your pillow size before placing your order.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars600 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: 100% Egyptian Cotton - Luxuriously-long Staple Cotton Yarns Make These Pillow Shams Incredibly Soft and Durable, 100% Egyptian Cotton - Luxuriously-long Staple Cotton Yarns Make These Pillow Shams Incredibly Soft and Durable
